verses.verse: Oh <S%H3863><s%> that you would tear <S%H7167><s%> the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> that you would come down, <S%H3381><s%> that the mountains <S%H2022><s%> might quake <S%H2151><s%> at your presence, <S%H6440><s%>

as when fire <S%H784><s%> kindles <S%H6919><s%> the brushwood, <S%H2003><s%> and the fire <S%H784><s%> causes the waters <S%H4325><s%> to boil; <S%H1158><s%> to make your name <S%H8034><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> to your adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> that the nations <S%H1471><s%> may tremble <S%H7264><s%> at your presence! <S%H6440><s%>

When you did <S%H6213><s%> awesome things <S%H3372><s%> which we didn't <S%H6960><s%> look for, <S%H3381><s%> you came down, the mountains <S%H2022><s%> quaked <S%H2151><s%> at your presence. <S%H6440><s%>

For from of old <S%H5769><s%> men have not heard, <S%H8085><s%> nor perceived by the ear, <S%H238><s%> neither has the eye <S%H5869><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> a God <S%H430><s%> besides <S%H2108><s%> you, <S%H6213><s%> who works for him who waits for him. <S%H2442><s%>

You meet him who rejoices <S%H7797><s%> and works <S%H6213><s%> righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> those who remember <S%H2142><s%> you in your ways. <S%H1870><s%> Behold, <S%H7107><s%> you were angry, and we sinned. <S%H2398><s%> We have been in sin <S%H2398><s%> for a long time; <S%H5769><s%> and shall we be saved? <S%H3467><s%>

For we have all become as one who is unclean, <S%H2931><s%> and all our righteousness <S%H6666><s%> is as a polluted <S%H5708><s%> garment: <S%H899><s%> and we all fade <S%H5034><s%> as a leaf; <S%H5929><s%> and our iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> like the wind, <S%H7307><s%> take us away. <S%H5375><s%>

There is none who calls <S%H7121><s%> on your name, <S%H8034><s%> who stirs up <S%H5782><s%> himself to take hold <S%H2388><s%> of you; <S%H5641><s%> for you have hidden your face <S%H6440><s%> from us, <S%H4127><s%> and have consumed us by means <S%H3027><s%> of our iniquities. <S%H5771><s%>
But now, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, you are our Father; <S%H1><s%> we are the clay, <S%H2563><s%> and you our potter; <S%H3335><s%> and we all are the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Don't <S%H7107><s%> be furious, <S%H3966><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> neither remember <S%H2142><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> forever: <S%H5703><s%> see, <S%H5027><s%> look, we beg you, <S%H5971><s%> we are all your people.
Your holy <S%H6944><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> are become a wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> has become a wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a desolation. <S%H8077><s%>

Our holy <S%H6944><s%> and our beautiful <S%H8597><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> where our fathers <S%H1><s%> praised <S%H1984><s%> you, <S%H8316><s%> is burned with fire; <S%H784><s%> and all our pleasant places <S%H4261><s%> are laid waste. <S%H2723><s%>
Will you refrain <S%H662><s%> yourself for these things, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh? Will you hold your peace, <S%H2814><s%> and afflict <S%H6031><s%> us very severely? <S%H3966><s%>
